trans-unit.source: Exposes methods used to return metadata about a service.
trans-unit.target: Exponerar metoder som används för att returnera metadata om en tjänst.

trans-unit.source: When programming [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] services, it is useful to publish metadata about the service.
trans-unit.target: Vid programmering [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] tjänster, är det praktiskt att publicera metadata om tjänsten.

trans-unit.source: For example, metadata can be a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document that describes all of the methods and data types employed by a service.
trans-unit.target: Metadata kan till exempel vara ett dokument för Web Services WSDL (Description Language) som beskriver alla metoder och datatyper som används av en tjänst.

trans-unit.source: Returning metadata about an [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] service allows consumers of a service to easily create clients for the service.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar metadata om en [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] kan användare av en tjänst för att skapa klienter för tjänsten.

trans-unit.source: For more information about [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] metadata endpoints, see [Metadata](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Mer information om [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] Metadataslutpunkter, se [Metadata](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Services implemented using [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] publish metadata by exposing one or more metadata endpoints.
trans-unit.target: Tjänster som implementeras med hjälp av [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] publicera metadata genom att exponera en eller flera Metadataslutpunkter.

trans-unit.source: Metadata endpoints in [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] have an address, a binding and a contract like any other endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Metadata-slutpunkterna i [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] har en adress, en bindning och ett kontrakt som andra slutpunkter.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataReference> interface specifies the service contract implemented by all metadata endpoints in [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataReference>gränssnittet anger tjänstekontraktet implementeras av alla metadata slutpunkterna i [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataReference>

trans-unit.source: There is no need to implement the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataReference> contract in your service implementation.
trans-unit.target: Det finns inget behov av att implementera den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataReference>kontrakt i tjänsteimplementeringen av.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataReference>

trans-unit.source: Instead, add the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceMetadataBehavior> to the service description.
trans-unit.target: Lägg den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceMetadataBehavior>till tjänstebeskrivningen.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceMetadataBehavior>

trans-unit.source: Or, when using configuration, set the `contract` attribute of the endpoint element to `IMetadataExchange`.
trans-unit.target: När du använder konfiguration kan du ange den `contract` attribut för slutpunktselementet till `IMetadataExchange`.

trans-unit.source: For an example, see [How to: Publish Metadata for a Service Using a Configuration File](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Ett exempel finns [så här: publicera Metadata för en tjänst med en konfigurationsfil](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: For details on publishing metadata in [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] see [Publishing Metadata](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Mer information om publicering av metadata i [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] finns [publicering av Metadata](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Starts an asynchronous retrieval of metadata.
trans-unit.target: Startar en asynkron hämtning av metadata.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> that should be processed to determine the metadata to return.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message>som ska bearbetas för att fastställa metadata för att returnera.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.AsyncCallback> that points to the method that will process the metadata.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.AsyncCallback>som pekar på den metod som bearbetar metadata.</xref:System.AsyncCallback>

trans-unit.source: Any data which allows the caller to determine which asynchronous call is being returned.
trans-unit.target: Alla data som gör att anroparen att avgöra vilket asynkron anropa returneras.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IAsyncResult> that can be passed to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IMetadataExchange.EndGet*> method.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.IAsyncResult>som kan skickas till den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IMetadataExchange.EndGet*>metoden.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IMetadataExchange.EndGet*> </xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: Concludes the retrieval of metadata.
trans-unit.target: Avslutar hämtning av metadata.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IAsyncResult> that contains data used to further process the metadata.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.IAsyncResult>som innehåller data som används för att fortsätta bearbeta metadata.</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> containing the processed metadata.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message>som innehåller bearbetade metadata.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message>

trans-unit.source: Returns the service metadata.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar tjänstens metadata.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> that contains the request for metadata.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message>som innehåller en begäran för metadata.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> containing the metadata.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message>som innehåller metadata.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message>
